sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import Slider, { Settings } from 'react-slick' import { ITitleBase } from '../Interfaceses/ITitleBase' import TitleCard from './titleCard' import styles from './../styles/slider.module.css' import { IGenere } from './../Interfaceses/IGenere' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { loadTitleBases } from '../store/slices/TitleSlice' export interface TitleSliderProps {} export interface TitleSliderState {} class TitleSlider extends React.Component { render() { const testElement: ITitleBase = { TitleDetailsId: 12, id: 12, name: 'TestAnime', posterUrl: 'test.jpg', treeId: 2, userRating: 9.5, generes: new Array(), } const settings: Settings = { dots: false, infinite: false, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 6, slidesToScroll: 3, arrows: false, className: '', adaptiveHeight: true, } return (
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state: any) => ({titleBases: state.titles}) const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch:any)=>({ loadTitleBase: ()=>dispatch(loadTitleBases()) }) connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(TitleSlider) export default TitleSlider
